com.giift.sdk.io.wallet

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.io.wallet.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements all the User related request to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • LoginAsync

        public static void LoginAsync(@NonNull
                              android.content.Context context,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String email,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String password)
        Asynchronous method to login an existing user. The result is broadcast. Use Authenticate.BROADCAST_ACTION to listen to the broadcast.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task
        email - user's email address
        password - user's password

      • LoginSync

        public static android.os.Bundle LoginSync(@NonNull
                                          android.content.Context context,
                                          @NonNull
                                          java.lang.String email,
                                          @NonNull
                                          java.lang.String password)
        Synchronous method to login an existing user.
        Parameters:
        context - used to gather the proper base urls and other resources
        email - user's email address
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        bundle containing the result of the operation

      • LoginSocialAsync

        public static void LoginSocialAsync(@NonNull
                                    android.content.Context context,
                                    @NonNull
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    @NonNull
                                    java.lang.String token,
                                    User.SocialProvider provider)
        Asynchronous method to Sign in/sign up through a social media.The result is broadcast. Use Authenticate.BROADCAST_ACTION to listen to the broadcast.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task
        name - used to store the account name ; provide social media name
        token - token provided by the social media to identify the user
        provider - social media that is used to authenticate the user

      • LoginSocialSync

        public static android.os.Bundle LoginSocialSync(@NonNull
                                                android.content.Context context,
                                                @NonNull
                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                @NonNull
                                                java.lang.String token,
                                                User.SocialProvider provider)
        Method to Sign in/sign up through a social media.
        Parameters:
        context - used to gather the proper base urls and other resources
        name - used to store the account name; provide social media name
        token - token provided by the social media to identify the user
        provider - social media that is used to authenticate the user
        Returns:
        bundle containing the result of the operation

      • RefreshTokenAsync

        public static void RefreshTokenAsync(@NonNull
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Asynchronous method to refresh access_token using the refresh_token.The result is broadcast. Use Authenticate.BROADCAST_ACTION to listen to the broadcast.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task

      • RefreshTokenSync

        public static android.os.Bundle RefreshTokenSync(@NonNull
                                                 android.content.Context context)
        Synchronous method to refresh access_token using the refresh_token.
        Parameters:
        context - used to gather the proper base urls and other resources
        Returns:
        bundle containing the result of the operation

      • SignUpAsync

        public static void SignUpAsync(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String email,
                               java.lang.String password,
                               java.lang.String countryCode)
        Tries to create a user. This method is asynchronous. Result will be broadcast. Use Authenticate.BROADCAST_ACTION to listen to the broadcast.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task
        email - new user's email address
        password - new user's password
        countryCode - country code of the user, this is an iso code

                                   android.content.Context context,
                                   @NonNull
                                   java.lang.String token,
                                   User.SocialProvider provider,
                                   java.lang.String user)
        Asynchronous method to add a link between the current user and a social media.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task
        token - token provided by the social media to identify the user
        provider - social media that should be added
        user - current user id

        Parameters:

      • LogoutSync

                              android.content.Context context)

        Parameters:

      • IsLogged

        public static boolean IsLogged(android.content.Context context)
        This method checks if a user is logged or not from the server point of view. This method is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - used to gather the proper base urls and other resources
        Returns:
        bundle containing the result

      • KeepAlive

        public static void KeepAlive(android.content.Context context)
        Sends a dummy request to the server, to make sure that the session does not time out because of inactivity. This method is asynchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task

      • UpdateAsync

        public static void UpdateAsync(android.content.Context context,
                               android.os.Bundle args)
        Request to update a user definition on the server. This method is asynchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background task
        args - bundle of key-value. Possible keys are:
        • User.COLUMN_BIRTHDAY
        • User.COLUMN_COUNTRY
        • User.COLUMN_CURRENCY
        • User.COLUMN_GENDER
        • User.COLUMN_LAST_NAME
        • User.COLUMN_USER_NAME
        • User.COLUMN_FIRST_NAME

      • ReLogSync

        public static java.lang.String ReLogSync(android.content.Context context)
        Log the user again using the different authentication mediums available.
        Parameters:
        context - used to gather the proper base urls and other resources
